description: REDACTED MEMORANDUM OPINION  as to Osazee Nathaniel Oboh. As the petitioner under § 2255, Mr. Oboh fails to meet his burden of establishing that his conviction and sentence are in violation of the Constitution, or that a fundam ental defect resulted in a complete miscarriage of justice or an egregious error. His Emergency Motion Pursuant to  28  U.S.C. § 2255 [Doc. 1] is therefore DENIED. The Court will enter an order consistent with this opinion. Signed by District Judge J Ronnie Greer on 03/05/2025.   (CAT)
